references.paper_title: Nonlinear ica of temporally dependent stationary sources
references.reason: This paper lays the groundwork for understanding nonlinear ICA in time series data, which is a central challenge addressed in the main paper.
This paper directly addresses the problem of learning temporally causal latent processes, a key component of the methodology in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Hidden Markov nonlinear ica: Unsupervised learning from nonstationary time series
references.reason: This paper introduces a framework for handling nonstationary time series using nonlinear ICA, which is essential to the main paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Variational autoencoders and nonlinear ica: A unifying framework
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for unifying variational autoencoders and nonlinear ICA, which is relevant to the methodological approach.
This foundational paper on variational autoencoders is crucial to the architecture of the proposed model in the main paper.
